column5: Find me and I'll have a gallon jug in the truck. Worth $31 and no use to me. Wayne  Percher...matrix covers are in the truck as well.
Hell and here I thought that Rudes didn't need oil OR gas!
Irish... I think I can use it in my engine... 40Hp Evinrude 2 stroke. but I dont expect it for free. I will give you what you wanted for it in the classifieds,  Gerritt.
We can arm wrestle over it when we get there Gerritt. It'll be in the truck !  YOu buy those things I suggested to give a whirl ?  Roy...!

I did and thank you for the suggestion... I did not pm you because I wanted to talk to you this weekend in person about it.  did you find them uncomfortable?  Thanks for the Oil Wayne, evinrude states for 1993 and newer motors on the XD30... but my motor has VRO removed so I mix... I will ask the dealer when I get a chance if it is suitable. but I would sure appreciate it! as I can use it in a family members motor if not in mine.  G.
Sounds good.. I'm bringin mine and no they don't bother me at all after a few days of gettin use to it.
